__e: Something between my Uncle Rex and my mother's best friend at the time.
Man, oh, man. I keep seeing that look on Rex's face. Then him taking off.
It's true Rex and I did not have the perfect marriage, but for 18 years I tried my very best, and for that I am entitled to your respect.
So if we believe the girls, Rex isn't the killer.
Whatever it was, rex wanted no part of it.
And Rex... I don't know if you've noticed, but he's kind of a scary guy.
